tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ForecastingInventoryLevels (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name STRING,
  quantity INT,
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Forecast (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 product_name STRING,
 forecasted_quantity INT,
 date DATE);

CREATE TABLE Shipment (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 product_id INT,
 warehouse_id INT,
 supplier_id INT,
 shipment_date DATE);
